credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Embroidered frontal
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Horizontal rectangle. Five-sixth shown. Sheaves are connected above by drapery festoons, below by scrolls to form three compartments. The lateral ones are decorated with plants rising between the scrolls. A cross hangs in the central panel. The framing border is divided into oblongs and squares at the corners. Colored background.
name: Drawing
